customer_addr:
759 E END MOUNTAIN RD
MILL HALL, PA 17751

citations.narrative:
During the inspection, there were 3 guinea pigs observed outside their enclosures on the floor of the building. The side
walls of the enclosures are approximately 7 inches in height, but did not contain the animals.
Guinea pigs that have escaped their enclosures are not able to access food and water and could be at risk of injury if they
fall from a high enclosure.
The licensee must ensure that the enclosures contain the guinea pigs at all times.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee and a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.25(a)  Repeat
   
Facilities, general. 
During the inspection, there were 3 guinea pigs observed outside their enclosures on the floor of the building. The side 
walls of the enclosures are approximately 7 inches in height, but did not contain the animals.  
Guinea pigs that have escaped their enclosures are not able to access food and water and could be at risk of injury if they 
fall from a high enclosure. 
The licensee must ensure that the enclosures contain the guinea pigs at all times. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee and a facility representative.
